scripts.build: node esbuild.js && extism-js dist/index.js -i src/index.d.ts -o bundled.wasm
scripts.build-hash: node esbuild.js && extism-js dist/hash.js -i src/hash.d.ts -o hash.wasm
scripts.build-module: node esbuild.js && extism-js dist/module.js -i src/module.d.ts -o module.wasm
scripts.build-sys: node esbuild.js && extism-js dist/sys.js -i src/sys.d.ts -o sys.wasm
